attributes.action: Women aged 50+ Must get state pension from age 60. Reverse needed by government
attributes.additional_details:
A 55 year old woman now not able to get state pension until 66 years and 9 months looses £56000. 
There should be something in place for women to still retire at 60 if they have full years stamp paid.
attributes.background:
Women now in their 50's and 60's started work knowing they would get state pension at 60.
Many will loose upto £56000 due to this unjust change. 
The poorer people working hard all their lives and paying into the system are the real losers and will be unable to manage to live.
